scripts.install:all: npm install --prefix server --include=dev && npm install --prefix client --include=dev
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix server" "npm run dev --prefix client"
scripts.lint: npm run lint --prefix server && npm run lint --prefix client
scripts.format: npm run format --prefix server && npm run format --prefix client
scripts.format:check: npm run format:check --prefix server && npm run format:check --prefix client
